title: Report to NMLS
context: ยง454F-20 Report to NMLS. Notwithstanding any other law to the contrary, the commissioner is required to regularly report violations of this chapter, as well as enforcement actions and other relevant information, to NMLS subject to the confidentiality provisions contained in section 454F-14. [L Sp 2009, c 32, pt of ยง2; am L 2013, c 168, ยง17]
